DOC.brief_summary: Clinical effectiveness fine tool evaluate treatment success combine 3 element : treatment effectivity , side effect profile patient compliance . Since 3 main PDE5i 's differ molecular structure , therapeutic profile pharmacokinetics , seem logical assume combine 2 different PDE5i 's low dosage may beneficial comparison single PDE5i maximal dose therapy . The aim study compare clinical effectiveness combination therapy ( 2 lower-dose PDE5i 's ) versus single maximal dose PDE5i therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Effectiveness 2 Lower Dose Combined PDE5i 's Versus Single Maximal Dose PDE5i Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , 3-arm parallel trial 60 male erectile dysfunction ( ED ) never expose PDE5i therapy ( naïve patient ) enrol . In group , every patient receive three treatment regime ( Viagra®50mg & Cialis®10mg , Viagra®100mg , Cialis®20mg ) , different sequence administration .
DOC.criteria: Age range 3575 year . Sexually active IIEF ED domain score 22 Subjects premature ejaculation main sexual complaint . Subjects severe cardiovascular disease Subjects Contraindications PDE5i therapy . Namely patient receive treatment nitrate base medication patient various reason take PDE5 inhibitor ( i.e severe coronary disease , liver renal failure , concomitant medication , etc . ) .
